Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
where can I download the invoices?

You can download your invoices directly from the NewsBreak Ad Manager. Simply navigate to the billing section, where you'll find options to view and download your invoices. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
I can only see the list of transactions but i cannot download the invoices. how do I do that?

To download your invoices, make sure you're in the billing section of the NewsBreak Ad Manager. Look for a download button or link next to each transaction listed. If you don't see this option, it might be a display issue or permissions setting. Try refreshing the page or checking your account settings. If the problem persists, please contact adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
there is no link to download. what am I doing wrong?

If you're unable to find the download link for your invoices, it might be due to a permissions issue or a display error. Please ensure that you are logged into the correct account and have the necessary permissions to access billing information. If everything seems correct and you still can't find the download option, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can help troubleshoot the issue.
